description:
People have created many stories. Joy, sadness, anger, deep emotion. Stories stir up emotion and captivate. However, those emotions are nothing more than the feelings of a spectator. What if the characters in the stories had their own will. In their eyes, are we, the creators of the stories, like gods? Revolution for our world. Punishment for the land of the gods. Re:CREATORS. Everyone becomes a Creator.
Note: The first episode received an early screening at a special event on 19 March 2017 somewhere in Tokyo. Additionaly, the first two episodes received an early screening at a special event on 2 April 2017 somewhere in Tokyo and Osaka. The regular TV broadcast started on 8 April 2017.

REGULAR.description:
Sota Mizushino was watching the anime "Elemental Symphony of Vogelchevalier" in his room when suddenly, Selesia Upitiria, a character from the anime, and a mysterious girl dressed in a military uniform appear in his room. Sota gets caught in the middle of their battle and follows them to Yoyogi Park, where Meteora Ã-sterreich, a character from the game "AVALKEN of Reminisce", suddenly appears.
Source: amazon

titles.title: "I Will Remember Everything That Happened to Me."
"Je me souviendrai de tout ce qu`il m`est arrivé."
Subarashiki Koukai "I Will Remember Everything That Happened to Me."
素晴らしき航海 "I will remember everything that happened to me."
멋진 항해 "I Will Remember Everything That Happened to Me."

REGULAR.description:
Sota tries to fulfill Selesia`s wish to meet the Creator of her story, and contacts Takashi Matsubara, the author of "Elemental Symphony of Vogelchevalier". Selesia waits for Matsubara at Ikebukuro when Mamika Kirameki, the main character from "Magicalslayer Mamika", suddenly appears. Mamika, angry at the Creators who created sad stories, and Selesia, who opposes her, start battling...
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "......That Wasn`t Funny."
Dynamite to Cool Guy "......That Wasn`t Funny."
Un mec cool et de la dynamite "... ce n`était pas drôle."
ダイナマイトとクールガイ "......that wasn`t funny."
다이나마이트와 쿨가이 "......that wasn`t funny."

REGULAR.description:
Selesia gets rescued by Yuya Mirokuji, a character from the manga "Exclusive Underground". Mirokuji is uninterested in making the Creators revise his story, the idea proposed by the Military Uniform Princess, and disappears. Later, the group gathers at Matsubara`s house with Marine, the illustrator for "Elemental Symphony of Vogelchevalier", and tries revising Selesia`s character description.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "Don`t Worry About What Others Said. Just Be Yourself."
Heibon ni Shite Hibon Naru Nichijou "Don`t Worry About What Others Said. Just Be Yourself."
Un quotidien extraordinaire pour une personne ordinaire "Peu importe ce que disent les autres. Sois toi-même."
平凡にして非凡なる日常 "Don`t worry about what others said. Just be yourself."
평범하면서 비범한 일상 "Don`t worry about what others said. Just be yourself."

REGULAR.description:
Meteora hypothesizes that characters possessing special powers interfering in the real world could cause the world to be destroyed. Meteora realizes that her Creator loved everyone who plays the video game she stars in, and vows to stop The Great Destruction to protect the people her Creator loved. Meanwhile, Alicetaria February from "Alicetaria of the Scarlet" joins the Military Uniform Princess.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "If So, I Want to Protect What He Loved."
Sono Toki wa Kare ni Yoroshiku "If So, I Want to Protect What He Loved."
À ce moment-là, je lui ai dit bonjour. "Dans ce cas, je protégerai ce qu`il a aimé."
そのときは彼によろしく "If so, I want to protect what he loved."
그 때는 그에게 잘 전해줘 "If so, I want to protect what he loved."

REGULAR.description:
Matsubara visits screenwriter Masaaki Nakanogane’s house where he finds Rui Kanoya from “Monomagia The Infinite Over Machine”. The group is summoned to a special council tasked with investigating the appearance of Creations. Meteora makes a deal with the council director, Aki Kikuchihara, to find the Creations, protect their Creators, and hunt down the Military Uniform Princess and her Creator.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "So, Why Don`t We Have Ourselves a Guys` Night Out?"
Doko yori mo Tsumetai Kono Mizu no Soko "So, Why Don`t We Have Ourselves a Guys` Night Out?"
Le fond de l`eau est plus froid ici que partout ailleurs "Pourquoi ne ferions-nous pas une sortie entre mecs ?"
どこよりも冷たいこの水の底 "So, why don`t we have ourselves a guys` night out?"
어느곳보다 차가운 이 물 속 "So, why don`t we have ourselves a guys` night out?"

REGULAR.description:
Meteora senses that a new Creation has appeared in the world, but arrives at the scene only to find the aftermath of a massacre. Meawhile, Mamika and Alicetaria run into Magane Chikujoin from “Yaso Kiroku” while searching for Creations to join their cause. Mamika asks her to join them, but Alicetaria notices the scent of blood. Selesia arrives in search of Magane, and a fierce battle ensues.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "You Are the One Who Knows Where Justice Lies."
Inochi Mijikashi Koi Seyo Otome "You Are the One Who Knows Where Justice Lies."
La jeune fille porteuse d`amour "Toi seule sait où trouver la justice."
いのち短し恋せよ乙女 "You are the one who knows where justice lies."
짧은 인생, 사랑하라 소녀여 "You Are the One Who Knows Where Justice Lies."

REGULAR.description:
Mamika intervenes in a fight between Mirokuji and Blitz in order to stop people who can only reach an understanding through fighting. For the sake of the people in her world, and for the sake of fulfilling her role as “Magicalslayer Mamika”, Mamika asks Sota about the truth behind the world. Meanwhile, Nakanogane discovers the Military Uniform Princess’s true identity on a video posting website.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "I Don`t Want to Make a Mistake for the Sake of the People Who Are in My Story."
Sekai no Chiisana Shuumatsu "I Don`t Want to Make a Mistake for the Sake of the People Who Are in My Story."
Une petite apocalypse "Je ne veux pas faire d`erreur pour le bien-être des personnages de mon histoire."
世界の小さな終末 "I don`t want to make a mistake for the sake of the people who are in my story."
세계의 작은 종말 "I don`t want to make a mistake for the sake of the people who are in my story."

REGULAR.description:
The true identity of the Military Uniform Princess is Altair, a secondary creation of the character Shirotsumekusa from a social game called Eternal Wars Megalosphere. She gained support from many fans and was established as a separate identity. Sota hesitates to talk to Meteora about Altair. Meanwhile, Mamika hears about Altair from Sota, and confronts Altair to try to save the world.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "I Chose This Way of Life."
Tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir "J`ai choisi de vivre ainsi."
Watashi ni Dekiru Subete no Koto "I Chose This Way of Life."
わたしにできるすべてのこと "I CHOSE this way of life."
내가 할 수 있는 모든 것 "I CHOSE this way of life."

REGULAR.description:
Mamika is fatally injured in a battle with Altair, entrusts her dying wish to Magane, and dies in Alicetaria’s arms. Magane twists Mamika’s dying wish, making Alicetaria’s rage turn on Meteora. Magane tells Sota about Mamika’s death, and makes him believe he’s responsible for her death. Mirokuji and Meteora come to save Sota and start battling Magane, when suddenly Alicetaria arrives…
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "The World Requires Choice and Resolution."
Hanasaku Otome yo Ana o Hore "The World Requires Choice and Resolution."
La jeune fille en pleine floraison creuse un trou "Le monde demande des choix résolus."
花咲く乙女よ穴を掘れ "The world requires choice and resolution."
꽃 피는 소녀여 구멍을 파라 "The world requires choice and resolution."

REGULAR.description:
Yatoji succeeds in luring out Alicetaria, but is interrupted by Magane and falls prey to her Infinite Deception of Words. Meanwhile, Selesia rushes to help Meteora and faces off against Alicetaria. However, Altair interferes in the battle and makes Selesia’s weapon vanish, and Selesia gets stabbed by Alicetaria. With Selesia on the brink of life and death, Matsubara tries revising the story again.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "We Know Exactly How You Think and How You`re Fighting!"
Ne bouge pas, meurs, revis ! "On connaît ta façon de penser et de combattre !"
Ugokuna, Shine, Yomigaere! "We Know Exactly How You Think and How You`re Fighting!"
動くな, 死ね, 甦れ! "We know exactly how you think and how you`re fighting!"
꼼짝마, 죽어, 되살아나! "We know exactly how you think and how you`re fighting!"

REGULAR.description:
With Selesia and Meteora suffering critical wounds, the team is left in poor shape after their battle with Altair. Sota blames himself for the battle and withdraws from everyone. With Kanoya’s encouragement, he finally decides to reveal everything and confesses the truth. Sota tells the story of how he met Altair’s creator, Setsuna Shimazaki, and reveals that she is already dead.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "We Cannot Decide Where We Go but You Can."
Le monstre sous l`avant-toit "Vous pouvez décider du chemin à prendre. Nous, non."
Nokishita no Monster "We Cannot Decide Where We Go but You Can."
軒下のモンスター "We cannot decide where we go but you can."
처마 밑 몬스터 "We cannot decide where we go but you can."

REGULAR.description:
Sota deals with his feelings of guilt and regret for not being able to save Setsuna Shimazaki, and vows to stop Altair. Altair is different from ordinary Creations: Altair’s powers grow with each new spin-off story made about her, but Meteora’s powers are limited to her character description. Meteora comes up with a plan to revise their character descriptions and get the support of the viewers.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "Be Desperate and Draw Something Fascinating."
End Roll ni wa Hayasugiru "Be Desperate and Draw Something Fascinating."
Il est trop tôt pour le générique de fin "De désespoir, écris une histoire fascinante."
エンドロールには早すぎる "Be desperate and draw something fascinating."
엔드롤은 너무 이르다 "We cannot decide where we go but you can."

REGULAR.description:
Altair, the Creation at the center of the events that led to Setsuna Shimazaki’s suicide, gets transported to the real world. Meteora, the Seeker of a Thousand Miles, rises up to stop her. Altair and Meteora face off in a battle that will decide the fate of the world, where it is revealed that Meteora has a hidden role that only she can play, and a mission that only she can accomplish.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "An Unpredictable Story That No One Knows Where It`s Leading To."
Itsumo no Yori Michi Modori Michi "An Unpredictable Story That No One Knows Where It`s Leading To."
Le chemin habituel, celui du retour "Une histoire surprenante à la fin imprévisible."
いつものより道もどり道 "An unpredictable story that no one knows where it`s leading to."
평소처럼 들르는 길 돌아오는 길 "An unpredictable story that no one knows where it`s leading to."

REGULAR.description:
People have created many stories.Joy, sadness, anger, deep emotion. Stories stir up emotion and captivate.However, those emotions are nothing more than the feelings of a spectator.What if the characters in the stories had their own“will”? In their eyes, are we, the creators of the stories, like gods? Revolution for our world. Punishment for the land of the gods. Re:CREATORS. Everyone becomes a Creator.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "I Feel Painful and So Useless That I Want to Cry but It`s Fun Nevertheless."
Bokura ga Tabi ni Deru Riyuu "I Feel Painful and So Useless That I Want to Cry but It`s Fun Nevertheless."
La raison pour laquelle nous voyageons "J`ai envie de pleurer, mais ça reste amusant."
ぼくらが旅に出る理由 "I feel painful and so useless that I want to cry but it`s fun nevertheless."
우리가 여행을 떠나는 이유 "I feel painful and so useless that I want to cry but it`s fun

REGULAR.description:
Hikayu Hoshikawa, a character from the dating sim video game Starry Sky Milky Way, appears in front of the group. Hikayu doesn’t possess any abilities for battle but is still required to participate in the Elimination Chamber Festival since she’s a Creation. Ohnishi, Hikayu’s creator, comes up with an idea to help her. Meanwhile, a new Creation joins Altair’s side….
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "This Is Perfect! She Couldn`t Have Been Any More Perfect!"
Les vagues approchent la fin de l`errance "C`est parfait ! Elle n`aurait pas pu être plus parfaite !"
Samayoi no Hate Kare wa Yoseru "This Is Perfect! She Couldn`t Have Been Any More Perfect!"
さまよいの果て波は寄せる "This is perfect! She couldn`t have been any more perfect!"
방황의 끝에 파도가 밀려온다 "This is perfect! She couldn`t have been any more perfect!"

REGULAR.description:
The Creators, exhausted after the tight deadlines, and the Creations, who have been executing the plan, get a moment to relax before the real battle starts. The team rallies their spirits for the upcoming battle, each member recalling their own reasons for fighting: To save the world, to return home, to face the past… Selesia and the others enter the Bird Cage, where they lie in wait for Altair.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "C`est ici que ça commence, n`est-ce pas ?"
"This Is the Actual Beginning, Isn`t It?"
Subarashii Hibi "This Is the Actual Beginning, Isn`t It?"
すばらしい日々 "This is the actual beginning, isn`t it?"
멋진 나날 "This is the actual beginning, isn`t it?"

REGULAR.description:
The battle over the fate of the real world and the fate of the story worlds finally begins! Selesia is able to get back into Vogelchevalier again after winning the acceptance of the audience, and faces off against Altair. However, her new powers don’t work against Altair, and she struggles in the battle. Meanwhile, Blitz goes to pay someone a visit to tie up some loose ends.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "I Mean I`m the Creator."
"Je veux dire, je suis le créateur."
Sekai no Yane o Utsu Ame no Rhythm "I Mean I`m the Creator."
世界の屋根を撃つ雨のリズム "I mean I`m the CREATOR."
세계의 지붕을 두드리는 비의 리듬 "I mean I`m the CREATOR."

REGULAR.description:
Magane pays Sota a visit while he watches Selesia’s battle and tells him that he is just like her because they both use others to satisfy their own desires, laying the groundwork for her plans to make things “more interesting”. Meanwhile, Alicetaria, Blitz, and Sho turn against Altair in the Bird Cage, and join Selesia’s side instead. However, Altair still has one final trick up her sleeve…
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "As Long as We`re Alive, We Have to Enjoy Our Lives to the Fullest."
"Tant que nous sommes en vie, nous devons en profiter au maximum."
Subete Fukanzen na Bokutachi wa "As Long as We`re Alive, We Have to Enjoy Our Lives to the Fullest."
すべて不完全な僕たちは "As long as we`re alive, we have to enjoy our lives to the fullest."
모든것이 불완전한 우리들은 "As long as we`re alive, we have to enjoy our lives to the fullest."

REGULAR.description:
Selesia and the others encounter the final Creation, who turns out to be Charon, the hero from Elemental Symphony of Vogelchevalier, the same story Selesia comes from! While Selesia is overjoyed at the reunion, Charon is sick of the endless fighting in his world, and joins Altair, who is trying to destroy the world. Selesia refuses to fight against Charon, and makes up her mind in a big decision.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "L`histoire continuera, tant que quelqu`un croira en mon existence."
"The Story Continues, As Long as There Is Someone out There, Who Believes in My Existence."
Yasashisa ni Tsutsumareta nara "The Story Continues, As Long as There Is Someone out There, Who Believes in My Existence."
やさしさに包まれたなら "The story continues, as long as there is someone out there, who believes in my existence."
상냥함에 감싸인다면 "The story continues, as long as there is someone out there, who believes in my existence."

REGULAR.description:
After losing Alicetaria and Selesia, Meteora and the others try to trap Altair within the Bird Cage, but the audience sympathizes with Altair and transforms the Bird Cage into a stage for amplifying Altair’s powers! Meteora tries to turn the tables on her by bringing out their secret weapon: Sirius, a Creation with the same appearance and the same powers as Altair!
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "Quelqu`un reçoit le pouvoir de création et l`esprit prend vie grâce à la passion."
"Somebody Receives the Power of Creation, and the Spirit Is Redeveloped from Their Passion."
Zankyou ga Kieru Sono Mae ni "Somebody Receives the Power of Creation, and the Spirit Is Redeveloped from Their Passion."
残響が消えるその前に "Somebody receives the power of creation, and the spirit is redeveloped from their passion."
잔향이 사라지기 전에 "Somebody receives the power of creation, and the spirit is redeveloped from their passion."

REGULAR.description:
Altair incorporates Sirius into herself and overpowers the other Creations, bringing the world to the brink of The Great Destruction! Meteora and the others try to save the world by making Setsuna Shimazaki, Altair’s Creator and their last hope, appear in the world. Altair and Setsuna encounter each others as Creations in the same world, and begin to reveal their true feelings to each other.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "I Love You Too."
"Je t`aime aussi."
Sekai wa Futari no Tame ni "I Love You Too."
世界は二人のために "I love you too."
세계는 두사람을 위해 "I love you too."

REGULAR.description:
The Elimination Chamber Festival ends successfully, and everything draws to a close. As the Creations prepare to go back to their own worlds, they spend their last few moments enjoying the real world. On the day of parting, the Creations return to where they each belong, each carrying their own thoughts in their hearts. After sending them off, the Creators begin to create new stories…
Source: Amazon

Re:Creators
Re:Creators
Re:Creators
Re:Creators
Enter the World of Re:Creators
Housou Chokuzen Tokuban "Enter the World of Re:Creators"
放送直前特番 "ENTER THE WORLD OF Re:CREATORS"

Summer Tokuban: Hizou Joshi-tachi to Sugosu Hitotoki
